components.description: Display services duration heat map according to some timely aggregation
Display services map graph based on the system's services interactions.
Collection of HTTP related visualizations including data volume, errors over time, status codes, and top URLs.

children.name: Network Graph
children.description: The Http Network Graph Widget for OpenSearch Dashboards uses Vega for complex visualization of service interactions.

children.name: Data Volume
children.description: Get the rate of data (in bytes) returned by a log source.

children.name: Errors over Time
children.description: Get the rate of errors returned by a log source.

children.name: Status Codes over Time
children.description: Get the proportions of different status codes returned by a log source.

children.name: Top URLs
children.description: Get the most frequent URLs visited by a log source.
